titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the African American Cultural and Historical Museum of Washtenaw County records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: African American Cultural and Historical Museum of Washtenaw County

did.unittitle: African American Cultural and Historical Museum of Washtenaw County records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Organization established in 1993 to research, collect, preserve and exhibit cultural and historical materials relating to the life and work of African Americans in Washtenaw County, Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Record book containing minutes, program files, newsletters, correspondence, financial records, and constitution and by-laws; also scrapbook of clippings, programs, brochures, and other informational items.

corpname.primary_name: African American Cultural and Historical Museum of Washtenaw County
